description:
Vi-editor is a Linux/UNIX based text editor. For all people working on Linux, Mastering Linux should be on your priority list.
90% of the super computers use Linux, Vim is found on all these systems and it becomes essential to master Vi. Any other editors are the derivative of Vi-editor.

This course is intended to achieve a comprehensive learning. With illustrated practical examples.

If you really want to master the Linux editing, This is the course you should be taking.

The course will be taught in 8 chapters, Note down all the commands illustrated and you will have your custom cheat by the end of this course.

    ·Getting started

    ·Learning to customize

    ·More on editing

    ·Editing bigger blocks

    ·Searching in Vi

    ·Windows and Tabs

    ·Visual Mode

    ·Vi For programmers
title: Vim for Unix and Linux
